remarks: A structure product of rings has closed binary operation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
statement:
prdsmulrcl.y $e |- Y = ( S Xs_ R ) $.
prdsmulrcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Y ) $.
prdsmulrcl.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` Y ) $.
prdsmulrcl.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
prdsmulrcl.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. W ) $.
prdsmulrcl.r $e |- ( ph -> R : I --> Ring ) $.
prdsmulrcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. B ) $.
prdsmulrcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. B ) $.
prdsmulrcl $p |- ( ph -> ( F .x. G ) e. B ) $.
